Wheaton.Marianjoy Rehabilitation Hospital and Cl:
Marianjoy Rehabilitation Hospital is a 120-bed hospital in Wheaton, Illinois, dedicated to the delivery of physical rehabilitative medicine.
Marianjoy has a network of inpatient, subacute, and outpatient sites and physician clinics around the Chicago area including Oak Park, Oakbrook Terrace, and Wheaton. Through this network, Marianjoy provides comprehensive inpatient and outpatient rehabilitation services including driver rehabilitation, sports rehabilitation, a voice and swallowing institute, balance and vestibular clinic, post-concussive clinic, and therapeutic golf.
